creator: david.yao@cwusa.com
text:
Is there any plan on that?(https support on recording browser activity/proxy)

When that will be available?

My initial impression is that this would require a fair amount of work.  Either
that or some knowledge of https and Java that I don't have.  In the meantime,
couldn't testers develop their test scripts with https turned off, and then use
those same scripts to test either http/https servers?
creator: mstover1@apache.org

text:
Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
jsalvata@atg.com
text: Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
